子有能继续双击的;rights(13,4);rights(14,5);double(13,5)|;show()|;double(14,4)|;show()}}{预想图;addmine(11,3);addmine(13,4);lefts(12,3)|;rights(13,2);double(12,3)|;show()}}{我会这样选择。这个雷位置靠外，不被省下的概率大。这一步增加一个靠外的标雷和三个靠外的数字，使左边的下一次双击变成标一开四。;rights(7,6);double(7,5)|;show()|;double(6,6)|;show()|;double(8,4)|;show()|;double(8,3)|不过从结果来看似乎是亏了。;show(){;double(6,7)|;show()|;lefts(5,9)}{新分支;lefts(5,9)}}}{标准答案;lefts(0,0)|;lefts(0,15)|;rights(8,12);double(8,13)|;show()|;double(9,12)|;show()|;lefts(11,11)|;lefts(10,15)|;lefts(12,15)|;rights(13,14);double(12,15)|;show()|;lefts(6,7)|;rights(7,6);double(6,7)|;show()|;double(6,6)|;show()|;double(7,5)|;show()|;rights(6,2);double(5,1)|;show()|;double(5,2)|;show()|;rights(7,3);double(8,4)|;show()|;double(8,3)|;show()|;lefts(7,0)|;lefts(9,0)|;lefts(9,8)|;rights(8,7);double(9,8)|;show()|;rights(11,8);double(10,7)|;show()|;rights(14,9);double(13,10)|;show()|;double(13,9)|;show()|;rights(14,7);double(14,8)|;show()|;lefts(10,5)|;lefts(13,5)|;lefts(11,4)|;lefts(11,2)|;rights(13,4);rights(14,5);double(13,5)|;show()|;double(14,4)|;show()|;rights(13,2);double(13,3)|;show()}
